name: Bird Species Classifier
description: A Deep Learning-based End-to-End image classifier to identify 200 different bird species.
role: Worked as Machine Learning Engineer building various models using CNNs and fine-tuning them to achieve the desired results
Worked on developing various CNN-based models and trying to fine-tune them using K-Fold Cross-Validation
The best working models involved the InceptionV3 pretrained using the ImageNet dataset
Compiled a greater dataset using multiple existing labeled datasets including the CUB and NaBird datasets
